comments.body: It's probably good for the doc for createDirectStream to link to here, in addition to the other way around
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -19,16 +19,35 @@ package org.apache.spark.streaming.kafka
 
 import kafka.common.TopicAndPartition
 
-/** Something that has a collection of OffsetRanges */
+import org.apache.spark.annotation.Experimental
+
+/**
+ * :: Experimental ::
+ * Represents any object that has a collection of [[OffsetRange]]s. This can be used access the
+ * offset ranges in RDDs generated by the direct Kafka DStream (see
+ * [[KafkaUtils.createDirectStream()]]).

comments.body: Good call. Let me add the references.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -19,16 +19,35 @@ package org.apache.spark.streaming.kafka
 
 import kafka.common.TopicAndPartition
 
-/** Something that has a collection of OffsetRanges */
+import org.apache.spark.annotation.Experimental
+
+/**
+ * :: Experimental ::
+ * Represents any object that has a collection of [[OffsetRange]]s. This can be used access the
+ * offset ranges in RDDs generated by the direct Kafka DStream (see
+ * [[KafkaUtils.createDirectStream()]]).
